meanings.sent1: The priest blesseder the church before the ceremony.
meanings.sent2: The family blesseder the new home with prayers.
meanings.sent3: The ancient artifact was blesseder by the elders to protect it.
meanings.sent4: The sunlight blesseder the garden with a golden glow.
meanings.sent5: The special ritual blesseder the newborn baby with good fortune.

meanings.definition: To bestow divine favor or protection upon
meanings.sent1: The deity blesseder the travelers on their journey.
meanings.sent2: The kind words blesseder comfort to the grieving family.
meanings.sent3: The lucky charm blesseder its owner with good luck.
meanings.sent4: The rain blesseder the crops with much-needed water.
meanings.sent5: The guardian angel blesseder the child with safety and guidance.

meanings.definition: Feeling or showing gratitude or joy for something received
meanings.sent1: The blesseder child thanked everyone for the birthday gifts.
meanings.sent2: She had a blesseder smile on her face after the surprise party.
meanings.sent3: The blesseder puppy wagged its tail happily at the treats.
meanings.sent4: The blesseder students were excited about the field trip.
meanings.sent5: The blesseder recipient was overwhelmed with joy at the award.
